main.name: Sibil Sarjam Soren
main.bio: I'm a 4-year experienced Full Stack Developer with a knack for building products that make a difference. My expertise spans both frontend and backend technologies, enabling me to craft comprehensive solutions from the ground up.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to discuss your project or just to say hi.

work.title: Senior Analyst
work.description: Developing and maintaining robust backend services using Node.js and Express.js for financial applications

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Worked on Evaluate.ai platform, a web-based platform for evaluating and comparing products.

work.title: Senior Software Design Engineer
work.description: Worked on NewgenOne Platform, in IFormDesigner team to develop and maintain the IFormDesigner platform.

testimonials.text: Sibil is an exceptional full-stack developer. His ability to tackle complex problems and deliver robust solutions has been invaluable to our team. His expertise in React and Node.js helped us deliver our projects ahead of schedule.

Working with Sibil was a great experience. His deep understanding of both frontend and backend technologies, combined with his collaborative approach, made him an essential team member. He consistently delivers high-quality code.
Sibil's dedication to writing clean, maintainable code and his ability to mentor junior developers sets him apart. His contributions to our financial applications have been crucial to our success.
